headline: 🚨💥 UKRAINIAN TEEN SABO-SLUTS 😩👶💦 RECRUITED ON TELEGRAM 📱🔥 TO BLOW UP THEIR OWN MOMMYLAND 🇺🇦🍑‼️ PUTIN PAYS PERKY PUBESCENTS 🤑💣 FOR CONSCRIPTION CUMSHOTS 🫦💨
text:
UH-OH⁉️😱 RUSSIA 🐻🇷🇺 is SLIDING INTO DMs 📲💌 of UKRAINIAN KIDS 👶🧒 (some as YOUNG as 9️⃣‼️) on TELEGRAM 📱🔥, TIKTOK 💃📹, even VIDEO GAMES 🎮👾 to TURN 'EM into SABOTAGE SIMPS 😩💥! Ukrainian GOV 🏛️🇺🇦 says 8️⃣0️⃣0️⃣+ RECRUITS 🧑‍💻👦, 2️⃣4️⃣0️⃣ MINORS 🍼, PROMISED FAT STACKS 💰🤑 for BOMB JOBS 💣🧨 and ARSON ASSAULTS 🔥🍑!

MEET VLAD 👦😤, 1️⃣7️⃣-YO EDGE LORD who ROAD-TRIPPED 5️⃣0️⃣0️⃣ MILES 🗺️💨 from EASTERN SHITSHOW to RIVNE 🌳🏞️ to PICK UP a HIDDEN BOMB 💣📱 in the PARK 🏞️! Promised $2️⃣K 💸🍆 to PLANT it in MILITARY VAN 🚐🇺🇦 for CONSCRIPTION DRAFT DODGERS 😤🪖... 'When I wired it up 🔌⚡, I thought BOOM 💥💀 I'M GONE!' he SPILLED to BBC 🎤📺. Handler wanted LIVE-STREAM 📹🔴 so they could REMOTELY DETONATE 🧨📱 when some POOR SAP hopped in!

But SBU SECURITY SIMPS 🕵️‍♂️🚔 were WATCHING 👀🔍 and FOILED the PLOT ❌🚫! Now VLAD's CHILLING in JAIL ⛓️🍑 awaiting 1️⃣2️⃣-YR TERROR STRETCH 😩🔒. 'Nobody LIKES conscription cucks 🪖😡,' he SHRUGS 🤷‍♂️, but admits he could've BODY-BAGGED somebody 💀🪦!

RECRUITERS 🧑‍💻💼 HIT VULNERABLE VIRGINS 👦😢 who HATE DRAFT DADDIES 🪖👮 – no pro-RU SIMPING needed, just MONEY MOTIVATION 💰🤑! VLAD joined 'REMOTE WORK' CHANNELS 📱💼, got HIT UP by 'ROMAN' 🗣️🇷🇺 (street accent GANGSTA vibes 😎🚬) in 3️⃣0️⃣ MINS! Started SMALL: GRAB GRENADE 🧨❌ (ghosted, still got $3️⃣0️⃣ 💸), then ARSON VAN 🔥🚐 for $1️⃣0️⃣0️⃣ CRYPTO 💎🚀 (promised more, got SIMPED 😭).

BBC WENT UNDERCOVER 🕵️‍♂️🔥, joined SHADY CHANNELS 📱👥 with ARSON FLEXES 💥📹 (unverified but SUS 🤨), got PRICE SHEETS 💰📋: $1️⃣5️⃣0️⃣0️⃣ for POST OFFICE BLAZE 🏤🔥, $3️⃣0️⃣0️⃣ for BANK HEIST 💳🏦 cuz SECURITY GLASS = MOLOTOV MAIN CHARACTER 🥛🔥💨! Even BEAUTY TIP GROUPS 💅📱 and REFUGEE CHATS 🏃‍♂️🇺🇦 peddle 'HIGH PAY PART-TIME' that turns into SABO-GIGS 😈💣. 'I NEED ALL THE ARSON 🍑🔥, reliable SIMPS harder to find than cash!' they BEG 🤑📹.

TELEGRAM SAID 'NO VIOLENCE 🚫💥' but MOST CHANNELS STILL LIVE 📈👻 – one GREW 7️⃣5️⃣0️⃣ SIMPS since BBC SNITCHED 😤! SBU NAMES RU SPIES 🕵️‍♂️🇷🇺 as HANDLERS, EU GOVS BACK IT with UK ARSON JAILINGS 🇬🇧🔥 (warehouse aid BLOWN for PUTIN PAPI 🐻). Some TEENS GO BOOM 💥💀 – handlers DETONATE REMOTELY 🧨📱 to CLEAN UP! Vlad's WARNING: 'NOT WORTH IT 😩⛓️ – they CHEAT 🤑🚫, JAIL you 🔒, or BLOW YOUR ASS UP 💣🍑!'

SEND 📤 this to 1️⃣1️⃣🚫 YO GAMER GROUPS 👾📱 to EXPOSE the SABO-SCAM 💥❌!
If 0️⃣ back: you're a CONSCRIPTION CUCK 🪖😭
If 5️⃣ back: TELEGRAM TROLL SLUT 📱😈
If 2️⃣0️⃣ back: CERTIFIED SABO-SABOTEUR 💣👑💦
